availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Henderson (Ballard County, Kentucky, master carpenter)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, carpenter. Tennessee native. Married to Phoebe Gambrel Henderson. Father of Frances A. Henderson, Sarah J. Henderson, Nancy E. Henderson, John W. Henderson, William H. Henderson, James H. Henderson, Matilda Henderson, and Alice Henderson. Carpenter in Marshall County, Kentucky, in 1850. Master carpenter in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 433A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, pp. 601-602.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994027, Ballard County Births.
